"Feeling lost and confused about why I'm not getting any followers on Fridays, I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not interesting or engaging enough. Maybe my content isn't good enough, or maybe I'm just not cut out for this social media thing. #FollowFridayFail #SelfDoubt"

In this example, the individual is attributing the cause of their lack of followers on Fridays to their own personal shortcomings, such as being uninteresting or unengaging, rather than external factors like a lack of promotion or a saturated market. This internal attributional style reflects a negative self-perception and self-doubt.
